Extend Your Hand of Charity. Earn Rewards for the Hereafter

Rebuild Mosque Fund

"We humbly seek your support to help us raise funds for our mosque project, where unity and spirituality will flourish. Your contribution will make a meaningful impact on our community's future."

Zakat Fund

We humbly seek your support to aid those in need through zakat donations, where compassion and assistance will thrive. Your generosity will surely transform lives for a better future

Sadaqah Jariyah Fund

Sadaqah Jariyah is ongoing charity (continuous rewards) received by us (for good actions and deeds), that will not only benefit us in this life but will continue to benefit us after our death.
